Machinuino.model

Class MooreMachine.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Machinuino.model.MooreMachine.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    MooreMachine

    public static class MooreMachine.Builder
extends Object
    Builder for the MooreMachine, every method of this class will throw NullPointerException if null is passed as parameter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(MooreMachine.Builder builder) 
      Builder(String name) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MooreMachine.Builder addInputPin(Pin inputPin)
      Adds a input Pin to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder addOutput(String state, Set<BoolPin> boolPins)
      Adds a output to this machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states and pins of the machine, as this method will check the set of states and pins before adding the output
      MooreMachine.Builder addOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
      Adds a output Pin to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder addState(String state)
      Adds a state to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder addTransition(Transition transition)
      Adds a transition to the machine
      MooreMachine build()
      Builds the moore machine with characteristics specified by this builder
      BoolPin getBoolPinOfValue(Pin pin, boolean high)
      Returns a pin associated with a value
      Pin getInputPinOfName(String name)
      Searches the set of inputPins for the Pin whose name is specified by the parameter
      Pin getOutputPinOfName(String name)
      Searches the set of outputPins for the Pin whose name is specified by the parameter
      boolean hasInputPin(Pin inputPin)
      Checks if the pin passed is on this machine, getInputPinOfName(java.lang.String) returns a pin of this machine so there is no need to check
      boolean hasOutput(String state) 
      boolean hasOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
      Checks if the pin passed is on this machine, getOutputPinOfName(java.lang.String) returns a pin of this machine so there is no need to check
      boolean hasState(String state) 
      MooreMachine.Builder initialState(String initialState)
      Sets the initial state of the machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states of the machine, as this method will check the set of states before setting the initial one
      MooreMachine.Builder inputPins(Set<Pin> inputPins)
      Sets the input pins of the machine, preferably this method setting the pins should be the one of the first things to be done as setting the input pins enable setting the transitions
      MooreMachine.Builder outputPins(Set<Pin> outputPins)
      Sets the output pins of the machine, preferably this method setting the pins should be the one of the first things to be done as setting the output pins enable setting the outputs
      MooreMachine.Builder outputs(Set<Output> outputs)
      Sets the outputs of this machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states and pins of the machine, as this method will check the set of states and pins before setting the outputs

      Removes a input Pin from the machine

      MooreMachine.Builder removeTransition(Transition transition)
      Removes a transition from the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder states(Set<String> states)
      Sets the states of the machine, preferably the states should be one of the first things to be set as they enable other attributes to be set.
      String toString() 
      boolean transitionCausesNonDeterminism(Transition transition)
      Checks if there is a somewhat equivalent transition on this builder compared to the one passed, two transition are considered equivalent if they have the same previous and next state and their pins are the same

        public Builder(String name)

      • Builder

        public Builder(MooreMachine.Builder builder)

    • Method Detail

      • initialState

        public MooreMachine.Builder initialState(String initialState)
        Sets the initial state of the machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states of the machine, as this method will check the set of states before setting the initial one
        Parameters:
        initialState - the initial state of the machine, can not be null and has to be on the set of states
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the stated passed is not on this builder
        See Also:
        hasState(java.lang.String)

      • states

        public MooreMachine.Builder states(Set<String> states)
        Sets the states of the machine, preferably the states should be one of the first things to be set as they enable other attributes to be set. This method will verify if the states passed do not harm the integrity of the machine
        Parameters:
        states - states of the machine
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is output or a transition envolving a state of this machine not on the parameter passed

      • hasState

        public boolean hasState(String state)

      • addState

        public MooreMachine.Builder addState(String state)
        Adds a state to the machine
        Parameters:
        state - a state not already on this machine, can not be null
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the state passed is already on this machine

      • removeState

        public MooreMachine.Builder removeState(String state)
        Removes a state from the machine
        Parameters:
        state - a state already on this machine, can not be null
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the state passed is not on this machine or if this machine has a output or a transition involving the state passed
        See Also:
        hasState(java.lang.String), hasOutput(java.lang.String)

      • inputPins

        public MooreMachine.Builder inputPins(Set<Pin> inputPins)
        Sets the input pins of the machine, preferably this method setting the pins should be the one of the first things to be done as setting the input pins enable setting the transitions
        Parameters:
        inputPins - the input pins of the machine
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the pins are already in outputPins or if there is at least a pin not on the set passed which is involved in a transition
        See Also:
        hasOutputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • getInputPinOfName

        public Pin getInputPinOfName(String name)
        Searches the set of inputPins for the Pin whose name is specified by the parameter
        Returns:
        a pin with the specified name or null if not found

      • hasInputPin

        public boolean hasInputPin(Pin inputPin)
        Checks if the pin passed is on this machine, getInputPinOfName(java.lang.String) returns a pin of this machine so there is no need to check

      • addInputPin

        public MooreMachine.Builder addInputPin(Pin inputPin)
        Adds a input Pin to the machine
        Parameters:
        inputPin - a pin not already on this machine, can not be null
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the pin passed is already on this machine

      • removeInputPin

        public MooreMachine.Builder removeInputPin(Pin inputPin)
        Removes a input Pin from the machine
        Parameters:
        inputPin - a pin already on this machine
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the pin passed is not on this machine or if the pin is involved in a transition
        See Also:
        hasInputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • outputPins

        public MooreMachine.Builder outputPins(Set<Pin> outputPins)
        Sets the output pins of the machine, preferably this method setting the pins should be the one of the first things to be done as setting the output pins enable setting the outputs
        Parameters:
        outputPins - the output pins of the machine
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the pins are already in inputPins or if there is at least a pin not on the set passed which is involved in a output
        See Also:
        hasInputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • getOutputPinOfName

        public Pin getOutputPinOfName(String name)
        Searches the set of outputPins for the Pin whose name is specified by the parameter
        Returns:
        a pin with the specified name or null if not found

      • hasOutputPin

        public boolean hasOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
        Checks if the pin passed is on this machine, getOutputPinOfName(java.lang.String) returns a pin of this machine so there is no need to check

      • addOutputPin

        public MooreMachine.Builder addOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
        Adds a output Pin to the machine
        Parameters:
        outputPin - a pin not already on this machine, can not be null
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the pin passed is already on this machine

      • removeOutputPin

        public MooreMachine.Builder removeOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
        Removes a output Pin from the machine
        Parameters:
        outputPin - a pin already on this machine
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the pin passed is not on this machine or if the pin if involved in a Output
        See Also:
        hasOutputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • getBoolPinOfValue

        public BoolPin getBoolPinOfValue(Pin pin,
                                 boolean high)
        Returns a pin associated with a value
        Parameters:
        pin - Pin associated with a value, preferable use getInputPinOfName(java.lang.String) or getOutputPinOfName(java.lang.String) to get the Pin as Pins returned by these methods are garantied to be on this builder
        Returns:
        a BoolPin specified by the parameter
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the pin passed is not on any of this builder's sets
        See Also:
        hasOutputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin), hasInputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • transitions

        public MooreMachine.Builder transitions(Set<Transition> transitions)

      • transitionCausesNonDeterminism

        public boolean transitionCausesNonDeterminism(Transition transition)
        Checks if there is a somewhat equivalent transition on this builder compared to the one passed, two transition are considered equivalent if they have the same previous and next state and their pins are the same
        Parameters:
        transition - transition used to check
        Returns:
        true, if there is a transition on this builder somewhat equivalent to the one passed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if transition has the same pin with two values

      • addTransition

        public MooreMachine.Builder addTransition(Transition transition)
        Adds a transition to the machine
        Parameters:
        transition - the transition to be added
        Returns:
        this Builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the pins of the transition have duplicate values or the pins are not on this builder or trying to add a equivalent transition to this builder
        See Also:
        transitionCausesNonDeterminism(Machinuino.model.Transition)

      • removeTransition

        public MooreMachine.Builder removeTransition(Transition transition)
        Removes a transition from the machine
        Parameters:
        transition - a transition equivalent to the one to be removed
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the transition passed is not equivalent to any transition on this machine
        See Also:
        transitionCausesNonDeterminism(Machinuino.model.Transition)

      • outputs

        public MooreMachine.Builder outputs(Set<Output> outputs)
        Sets the outputs of this machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states and pins of the machine, as this method will check the set of states and pins before setting the outputs
        Parameters:
        outputs - the outputs of the machine, a element can not contain a state or pins not contained on this machine, can not be null, neither contain a null element
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the state or the pins of a output is not on this machine
        See Also:
        hasState(java.lang.String), hasOutputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin), hasInputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • hasOutput

        public boolean hasOutput(String state)

      • addOutput

        public MooreMachine.Builder addOutput(String state,
                                      Set<BoolPin> boolPins)
        Adds a output to this machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states and pins of the machine, as this method will check the set of states and pins before adding the output
        Parameters:
        state - a state of this machine, can not be null
        boolPins - pins contained on this machine, can not be null, neither contain a null element
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the state or the pins are not on this machine
        See Also:
        hasState(java.lang.String), hasOutputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin), hasInputPin(Machinuino.model.Pin)

      • removeOutput

        public MooreMachine.Builder removeOutput(String state)
        Removes a output from this machine
        Parameters:
        state - a state whose output has been set on this machine already
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the state passed does not have a output attached to it
        See Also:
        hasOutput(java.lang.String)

      • build

        public MooreMachine build()
        Builds the moore machine with characteristics specified by this builder
        Returns:
        A moore machine
